short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly log transactions into MoneyLover, as easy as chatting with a friend.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MoneyLover Assistant allows users to conveniently jot down expenses directly on the web browser. This enables you to easily track your expenses wherever you are.

To record a transaction in MoneyLover, instead of opening the mobile app and going through multiple steps, you can simply input a description of the transaction into MoneyLover Assistant the way you think of it. 

For example, you can input “Breakfast for 10k in cash” and MoneyLover Assistant will automatically create a transaction under the “Food & drink” category with a value of 10,000 in the “Cash” wallet in MoneyLover. 

You can also record multiple transactions in one message.

Try it for yourself. May your habit change forever.

—
NOTICE:
This feature is currently in the testing phase and only available for a small group of users. For more detailed updates, please follow the MoneyLover page on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/moneylover.me/ or visit us at https://support.moneylover.me/
